capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm glad to see that Flitwick is indeed affiliated with Hogwarts. It's always reassuring to know that our professors are committed to their work and the school we attend.

I'm not really sure what Flitwick's affiliation with Hogwarts is, to be honest. I mean, he was the Charms master and all, but I don't recall him being a member of any particular house. He seemed more like a bit of an outsider, you know? But maybe that's just my interpretation.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville does look a bit round-faced, doesn't he? I've seen him around town and I think that's definitely true.
